articles.author: Nectar Gan, CNN
articles.title: China's response to Pelosi's potential Taiwan visit could be 'unprecedented' but military conflict unlikely, experts say
articles.description: The United States is no stranger to China's angry responses over its support for Taiwan, a self-governing island that Beijing claims as its own territory.

articles.author: Veronica Stracqualursi, Chandelis Duster, Laura Ly
articles.title: Indiana Legislature convenes special session to consider abortion ban
articles.description: Indiana lawmakers reconvened on Monday to consider more restrictions on abortion, the first state to hold a special session with the goal of potentially curtailing abortion rights since the Supreme Court overturned Roe v. Wade last month.

articles.title: Uvalde school district suspends Robb Elementary School principal

articles.title: Biden says Trump "lacked the courage to act" on January 6
articles.description: "For three hours, the defeated former president of the United States watched it all happen as he sat in the comfort of the private dining room next to the Oval Office," Mr. Biden said Monday.

articles.title: At Least 9 Homes Destroyed in Balch Springs Grass Fire, Possibly Another Dozen Damaged
articles.description: A large grass fire in Balch Springs, Texas has caught multiple homes on fire Monday afternoon, causing evacuations in the area.

articles.description: The state's attorney general was in danger of being prosecuted for airing a possibly untruthful ad in 2020.

articles.title: Sixth boy charged in 1989 Central Park jogger case is exonerated

articles.title: Russia Announces Deeper Cuts in Natural Gas Flows to Germany
articles.description: Gazprom, Russia’s state energy giant, said it would halve the amount of gas it sends to Germany through the Nord Stream 1 pipeline, bringing it down to 20 percent of capacity.
